snippet: As growing number of Chinese business travelers flock to the United States, major hotel brands are starting programs that cater to the needs and preferences of Chinese visitors.
lead_paragraph: As growing number of Chinese business travelers flock to the United States, major hotel brands are starting programs that cater to the needs and preferences of Chinese visitors.

headline.main: American Hotels Embrace Chinese Business Travelers
headline.seo: American Hotels Embrace Chinese Business Travelers
